title: How to Deep Fry Camembert

steps.headline: Pour the breadcrumbs into a bowl.
Break the eggs into a bowl.
Dip the Camembert wedges into the egg mixture.
steps.description: Turn the wedge around in order to coat well.

steps.headline: Dip the egg-covered Camembert wedges into breadcrumb mixture.
steps.description: Coat the wedges using a fork to hold each piece into the breadcrumbs.

steps.headline: Repeat until all of the Camembert wedges are coated.
Pour oil into the small saucepan.
steps.description: There should be enough to cover the Camembert wedges.

steps.headline: Heat the oil until it becomes very hot.
Place a few wedges onto a flat metal ladle (with drainage holes).
steps.description: Lower the wedges into the oil. Allow to fry for about 20-30 seconds.

steps.headline: Remove and place on kitchen toweling.
Serve hot.
steps.description: If wished, serve with a favorite condiment for dipping.
